name: Feed The Baby 0.1
description:
HOW TO PLAY : current there are no hints etc but a tutorial system will be implemented later. move around with WASD and press space when ur touching the baby to feed it.

Just an early version of my upcoming puzzler game where you have to strategise your movements and priorities in order to feed the baby. Further gameplay mechanics such as the player becoming tired, unlockable skills and tools crafting to be implemented.

Hope you enjoy the concept for now! :)
